head.title: Making It in This New Economy

hedline.hl1: Making It in This New Economy

abstract.p: George N Miller letter comments on September 25 Op-Ed article by Ann L Berrois describing her financial straits in booming economy

block.p: If Ann L. Berrios (Op-Ed, Sept. 25) wants to know why she cannot afford a few ''extras'' in her peak earning years, she ought to check her tax bill. She lists her major expenses as a mortgage, insurance, gas, house maintenance, groceries and an auto lease. Yet if her budget is anything like mine, taxes surely occupy a prominent place in the top five or six expense categories.
GEORGE N. MILLER Somerset, N.J., Sept. 25, 2000
